price: 25. Longola sé baye bandimi mpe basali misala ya malamu bazali na lifuta ya suka te.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
